text: The CW ’ s new Charmed reboot has its fair share of critics — but Shannen Doherty is not among them. Doherty, who played Prue Halliwell in three of the original drama ’ s eight seasons, stood behind the new version during a Q & A at Comic - Con Paris. “ I have seen a lot of people be very mean and very negative and cruel to the new show and the new cast, ” Doherty began, after the mere mention of The CW ’ s reboot drew boos from the crowd. “ I want to remind everybody that these are three girls who just want to act.
